definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: salt (NH  id.; Ar. milh.un; Aram. melh.o0, [[מִלְחָא]]);—´[[מ]] abs. Ge 19:26 +; cstr. Le 2:13; —salt for seasoning food Job 6:6; offering Le 2:13, Le 2:13, Le 2:13 cf. Ez Eze 43:24; [[בְּרִית מֶ֫לַח]] Nu 18:19, 2Ch 13:5 (cf. Le 2:13 v. Di); used in purifying waters 2Ki 2:20, 2Ki 2:21; strewn on site of devoted city Ju Jdg 9:45 cf. Zep 2:9 (´[[מִכְרֵה־מ]]) De 29:22 (‖[[גׇּפְרִית]]); produced in marshes reserved for purpose Ez Eze 47:11; pillar of salt ´[[נְחִיב מ]] Ge 19:26; usu. in combin. [[הַמֶּלַח]] ([[־]]) [[יָם]] Ge 14:3 ([[עֶ֫מֶק הַשִּׂדִּים]]), Nu 34:3, Nu 34:12, De 3:17 (‖[[יׇם הָעֲתָבָה]]), Jos 3:16, Jos 12:3, Jos 15:2, Jos 15:5, Jos 18:19; also ´[[גֵיא־מ]] 2Sa 8:13, 2Ki 14:7 Qr, Ps 60:2 (title), ´[[גֵּיא הַמּ]] 1Ch 18:12, 2Ch 25:11, 2Ki 14:7 Kt.
